EndGame_RoyalAscent.questDescriptionRule.li:
questDescription->[intro]The [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name] will perform a customary visit with any Count of his domain upon request. Invite him, satisfy his royal needs for [shuttleDelayTicks_duration], and all of you can ride the shuttle to the Imperial flotilla. You may then join the Imperial court, or escape to a new life among the stars.

Earning the title of Count means completing quests to earn [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] with [asker_faction_name]. It may take years to finally achieve the title of Count.

During his visit, you must keep his mood above [lodgersMoodThreshold_percent]. This means providing royal perquisites like a lavish bedroom.[threatsInfo]

The [asker_faction_leaderTitle] will bring four of his personal guards and place them under your command. You must house these guards, but the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] will not complain if they are killed or unhappy.

You must keep the visitors at [map_definite] and not send them anywhere else. If you fail this quest or migrate, you will have another chance at it later.
intro(sameQuestsCount==0)->You have learned of a way to escape this planet!\n\n
intro(sameQuestsCount>=1)->You have been given another chance at royal ascent.\n\n
threatsInfo(allowViolentQuests==true,priority=1)->\n\nOthers will take the opportunity to try to kill the [asker_faction_leaderTitle], and will attack with great intensity. Be prepared to defend.

LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextAskerArriv:
The [asker_faction_leaderTitle] of [asker_faction_name], has arrived.

Protect him and satisfy his royal needs until the shuttle arrives in [shuttleDelayTicks_duration].

All of you can accompany the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] on the shuttle and travel to the Imperial flotilla to begin a new life.
{SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has died. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextShuttleArr: The shuttle has arrived to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle].\n\nAll of you can accompany the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] on the shuttle and travel to the Imperial flotilla to begin a new life.
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.EndGameEndingText.sl:
The high stellarch will now welcome you into the Imperial flotilla as an honored noble party.

You might stay in the Imperial court and jockey for political power. Perhaps you'll avoid the drama and focus on enjoying ultratech luxuries. Or, you might even buy a ship and set a course for your long-lost home.

The choice is up to you.
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.EndGameIntroText.sla: You've escaped on the Imperial shuttle!
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextSubjectUnh: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect and keep happy, has been below the minimum mood of [lodgersMoodThreshold] too long. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextGuestCaptu: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has been arrested. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextUnauthoriz: Unauthorized, violating surgery has been performed on {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.root.nodes.lodgersXe: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has had {SUBJECT_possessive} xenogerm forcibly absorbed. [failLetterEndingCommon]
{SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has left the assigned settlement. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextShuttleDes: The shuttle sent to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] has been destroyed. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextLodgerRanW: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has run wild. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.EndGame_RoyalAscent.LetterTextShuttleSen: The shuttle sent to collect the [asker_faction_leaderTitle] has departed without [asker_objective]. [asker_pronoun] will now leave on foot. [failLetterEndingCommon]
